text: Jahnoporus is a genus of fungi in the family Albatrellaceae. There are two species in the genus, which have a widespread distribution in northern temperate regions. The type species, J. hirtus, was transferred to this genus in 1980; it was formerly known as Piptoporus hirtus.Thorn RG. (1980). "Some polypores misclassified in Piptoporus". Karstenia 40 (1–2): 181–87. ==References== ==External links== *California Fungi: Jahnoporus hirtus Category:Russulales Category:Russulales genera
title: Jahnoporus
